div.p:
Book of double moresques, never printed before now, most useful for all artists, as for goldsmiths, embroiderers, glassmakers, and this kind of artists. Year
A new book of double moresques, very useful for goldsmiths, embroiderers, glassmakers, and all kinds of artists.
C Antwerp. Invented and engraved by Balthasar van den Bos.
